content:
# The stone furnace has produced a total of 13 iron plates, but it is currently in a "NO_INGREDIENTS" status because it has no iron ore left to smelt.
# 
# Since I have no iron ore in my inventory, I need to return to the nearest iron ore patch and harvest more iron ore to continue the smelting process.
# 
# I will move to the nearest iron ore patch now.

move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))  # Moving to the nearest iron ore patch to gather more iron ore.
